  • Classes in ca.jolt.routing.context used by ca.jolt.routing.context
    Class
    Description
    JoltContext
    Provides an HTTP context object that encapsulates request and response handling within the Jolt framework.
    JoltHttpContextValue
    An abstract base class representing a context-dependent value, such as a path parameter or query parameter.
    PathContextValue
    A specialized JoltHttpContextValue representing a path parameter.
    QueryContextValue
    A specialized JoltHttpContextValue for query parameters.
